messages: Someday, someone may experience{~N}these bizarre events. Hopefully,{~N}they will find my notes useful.{~E}
{~D}I don't have the map{~N}for this place.{~E}
{~D}Too dark to look{~N}at the map here.{~E}
There is a {~C2}First aid kit{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
The lock is jammed.{~N}This door can't be opened.{~E}
Statue of an old man's hand.
The fist shut tight,{~N}as if never to let go.{~E}
Just the melted remains of{~N}a statue of a hand.

{~L4}{~M}{~C3}]A Tale of Birds Without a Voice]{~N}{~N}First flew the greedy Pelican,{~N}Eager for the reward,{~N}White wings flailing.{~N}{~N}Then came a silent Dove,{~N}Flying beyond the Pelican,{~N}As far as he could.
{~L4}{~M}{~C3}A Raven flies in,{~N}Flying higher than the Dove,{~N}Just to show that he can.{~N}{~N}A Swan glides in,{~N}To find a peaceful spot,{~N}Next to another bird.
{~L4}{~M}{~C3}Finally out comes a Crow,{~N}Coming quickly to a stop,{~N}Yawning and then napping.{~N}{~N}Who will show the way,{~N}Who will be the key,{~N}Who will lead to{~N}The silver reward.{~E}
It won't open. Odd,{~N}doesn't look locked, though.{~E}
There's some blood{~N}on some of the keys.....
Distilled water.{~N}No reason to take it.{~E}
{~C3}Warning. Don't forget to{~N}take all of your possessions{~N} after using the lockers.
Normal elementary school{~N}bulletin board.{~N}Nothing in particular here.{~E}
No need to read{~N}any of these books.{~E}
There's some blood{~N}on some of the keys.....{~E}
